name: Band Of Heroes
summary: Josh is a lucky rogue who always finds his way to the most wanted treasures and artifacts... to snatch them for good. This time he gets into troubles and will have to team up with a group of strange but skillful guys to win.
info:
• 中文名: 英雄战队
